componentDescription:
The Grow transition is used by the [Tooltip](/material-ui/react-tooltip/) and
[Popover](/material-ui/react-popover/) components.
It uses [react-transition-group](https://github.com/reactjs/react-transition-group) internally.

propDescriptions.addEndListener: Add a custom transition end trigger. Called with the transitioning DOM node and a done callback. Allows for more fine grained transition end logic. Note: Timeouts are still used as a fallback if provided.
propDescriptions.appear: Perform the enter transition when it first mounts if in is also true. Set this to false to disable this behavior.
propDescriptions.children:
A single child content element.
⚠️ Needs to be able to hold a ref.
propDescriptions.easing: The transition timing function. You may specify a single easing or a object containing enter and exit values.
propDescriptions.in: If true, the component will transition in.
propDescriptions.timeout:
The duration for the transition, in milliseconds. You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.
Set to 'auto' to automatically calculate transition time based on height.
